noContentTV: There is currently no media for selected vertical TV.

errorWrongFileFormat: Selected file format is not supported. Please select a file with format .jpg, .png or .gif.

errorWrongContentResolutionForVerticalTV: Selected media does not have the required resolution! Please select media with a resolution of 1080x1920.

errorWrongContentResolutionForHorizontal: Selected media does not have the required resolution! Please select media with a resolution of 1920x1080.
